snippet: The Supreme Court let stand appeals court rulings allowing same-sex marriage in five states in a move that may signal the inevitability of a nationwide right to such unions.
abstract: Supreme Court lets stand appeals court rulings allowing same-sex marriage in five states in a move that may signal the inevitability of a nationwide right to such unions; development clears way for same-sex marriages in Indiana, Oklahoma, Utah, Virginia and Wisconsin.
lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court let stand appeals court rulings allowing same-sex marriage in five states in a move that may signal the inevitability of a nationwide right to such unions.

headline.sub: Declines to Take Up Appeals From Wave of Rulings in Favor
headline.main: Supreme Court Delivers Tacit Win to Gay Marriage
headline.print_headline: Supreme Court Delivers Tacit Win to Gay Marriage

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
